Posts.Content: Hi Jayne..i too feel angry and afraid ...im 2yr all clear but still had a few scares inbetween...i had a lumpectomy and radiotherapy..lucky not to have had the chemo...my breast care nurse was great pre op but post op she was useless and patronising i think because i only had grade one....that still dosnt change the fact that we live in fear of it returning elsewhere....i have lots of lumps and bumps and aches and pains and im convinced its come back..my GP suggested counciling and i will have to try it cos its taking over my life...i know exactly how you feel..you rant and rave as much as you like hun x
Posts.Title: Anger

Posts.Content: Didnt finish last paragraph......thing is every lump and bump i get im convinced its returned...i know theres so many people still fighting it so i feel i should be really happy but im not...i live every day in fear now ..stupid i know but its getting me down..
Posts.Title: living in fear while in remission

Posts.Content: Hi i was wondering if its normal to feel scared all of a sudden after 2 yr all clear from breast cancer...ive sailed through it all right up till having a lump in my throat..GP assures me its an enlarged thyroid gland
Posts.Title: living in fear while in remission

Posts.Content: As a newbie on here you have all made me feel better and know im not on my own with these feelings..im so pleased ive joined as suggested by my GP...thank you all xx
Posts.Title: living in fear while in remission
